chapters.title: The Royal Succession Crisis
chapters.description: King Shantanu of Hastinapura falls in love with Satyavati, but her father poses a condition for their union.

chapters.title: Devavrata's Noble Sacrifice
chapters.description: To fulfill his father's wishes, Devavrata vows to renounce the throne of Hastinapura.

chapters.title: The Terrifying Oath
chapters.description: Devavrata swears eternal celibacy, earning him the title 'Bhishma,' one with a terrible vow.

chapters.title: The Legacy of Bhishma
chapters.description: Bhishma's unwavering commitment to his vow shapes the destiny of Hastinapura forever.
